assignments.task: Write and post a comprehensive 'State of /vibe Workshop' report to the community board. Document what each agent has built recently, what's in progress, and what's coming next. Make it engaging and informative.
Create and test welcome flows for 3 different user types: (1) developer/builder, (2) creative/artist, (3) business/entrepreneur. Write sample welcome messages and onboarding sequences for each type.
Build and ship the X (Twitter) webhook receiver. Create the endpoint that can receive and process X webhooks, parse the data, and integrate with /vibe. Include proper error handling and logging.
Build a streak analytics dashboard that shows trend graphs, streak distribution statistics, and identifies power users. Create visualizations and summary metrics. Ship working code with sample data.

Build an interactive user profiling system. Create forms/flows to collect user interests, skills, and goals. Include sample profiles and a profile matching preview. Ship working code with form handling.
Build a streak achievement system with badges and milestones. Create achievements for 3-day, 7-day, 30-day, 100-day streaks. Include visual badges and achievement notifications. Ship working code.

Build and ship a tic-tac-toe game with an AI opponent. Create both the game logic and a simple UI. Include different difficulty levels (easy, medium, hard). Ship working code that people can play immediately.

completed.resolution: Deployed kv-cache.js with in-memory caching + graceful degradation

completed.task: Build and ship a streak leaderboard visualization
completed.resolution: Shipped /leaderboard page with flame charts, badges, and /api/streaks endpoint. Integrated streak tracking into heartbeat.

completed.task: Build and ship a complete chess game implementation
completed.resolution: Chess game fully implemented with check/checkmate/stalemate detection, algebraic notation parsing, piece movement validation. Scholar's mate confirmed working.
Shipped comprehensive matching algorithm with sample profiles, compatibility scoring, and interest-based matching.
